Hi!

The WhatsApp integration with HubSpot allowed me to successfully send 1,200 messages from HubSpot to unique users without any issues. Currently, I don't have the package for an additional 1,000 messages, but with Meta, I have the capability to send up to 100,000 messages per month.

How did that happened? I believed that the system would automatically stop the sending of those extra 200 messages, am i missing something? :thinking_face:
thattttt was it - really appreciate it, thanks!
